restrictions.sqlQuery: select * from charge_data_template where reccreatedby in (select rdev___auth_users.recid::text from rdev___auth_users left join users on users.login = rdev___auth_users.login where users.organizationid in (select organizationid from users where login in (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid')))

select * from charge_data_template where reccreatedby in (select rdev___auth_users.recid::text from rdev___auth_users left join users on users.login = rdev___auth_users.login where users.organizationid in (select organizationid from users where login in (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid')))

select * from charge_data_template where reccreatedby in (select rdev___auth_users.recid::text from rdev___auth_users left join users on users.login = rdev___auth_users.login where users.organizationid in (select organizationid from users where login in (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid')))

select * from charge_data_template where reccreatedby = '@activeUser.recid'
select * from charge_data_template where reccreatedby = '@activeUser.recid'

select * from charge_data_template where reccreatedby = '@activeUser.recid'
select * from charge_data_template where reccreatedby = '@activeUser.recid'

dataPolicies.name: payment_own_organization
dataPolicies.label: Просмотр платежей только в рамках своей организации

restrictions.sqlQuery: select * from payment where payee_inn in (select inn from organization where generate_by_api is distinct from true and recid in (select organizationid from users where login in (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid')))

dataPolicies.name: payment_own_organization_and_child
dataPolicies.label: Просмотр платежей только в рамках своей организации и дочерних

restrictions.sqlQuery: select payment.* FROM payment WHERE payee_inn IN (SELECT inn FROM organization WHERE generate_by_api is distinct FROM true AND recid IN (SELECT organizationid FROM users WHERE login IN (SELECT login FROM rdev___auth_users WHERE recid = '@activeUser.recid'))) or ( SELECT  parent_organization FROM organization WHERE organization.inn = payee_inn) = ( SELECT  organizationid FROM users WHERE login IN ( SELECT  login FROM rdev___auth_users WHERE recid = '@activeUser.recid'))

dataPolicies.name: payment_agregator
dataPolicies.label: Просмотр платежей либо своей организации, либо агрегетора (зависит от типа взаимодействия организации пользователя)

restrictions.sqlQuery: select p.* from users u join organization o on o.recid = u.organizationid left join organization o2 on o2.recid = o.aggregator join payment p on p.payee_inn = case when o.interaction_through_the_aggregator = true then o2.inn else o.inn end where o.generate_by_api is distinct from true and u.recid in (select recid from users where login in (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid'))

dataPolicies.name: users_own_organization
dataPolicies.label: Работа с пользователями только в рамках своей организации

restrictions.sqlQuery: select * from users where organizationid in (select organizationid from users where login in (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid'))
select * from users where organizationid in (select organizationid from users where login in (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid'))
select * from users where organizationid in (select organizationid from users where login in (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid'))

dataPolicies.name: organization_own_organization
dataPolicies.label: Редактирование организаций только в рамках своей организации

restrictions.sqlQuery: select * from organization where generate_by_api is distinct from true and recid in (select organizationid from users where login in (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid')) or recstate = 0

dataPolicies.name: payment_export_own_organization_and_child
dataPolicies.label: Чтение экспорта платежей только своей и дочерних организаций

restrictions.sqlQuery: select payment_export.* from payment_export join rdev___auth_users as au on au.recid::text = payment_export.reccreatedby join users as u on u.login = au.login join organization as o on o.recid = u.organizationid where o.recid in (select organization.recid from organization where organization.recid in (select organizationid from users where login = (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid')) or organization.recid in (select organization.recid from organization where organization.parent_organization in (select organizationid from users where login = (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid'))))
select * from payment_export where '@activeRecord.status = 1

dataPolicies.name: charge_export_own_organization_and_child
dataPolicies.label: Чтение экспорта платежей только своей и дочерних организаций

restrictions.sqlQuery: select charge_export.* from charge_export join rdev___auth_users as au on au.recid::text = charge_export.reccreatedby join users as u on u.login = au.login join organization as o on o.recid = u.organizationid where o.recid in (select organization.recid from organization where organization.recid in (select organizationid from users where login = (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid')) or organization.recid in (select organization.recid from organization where organization.parent_organization in (select organizationid from users where login = (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid' limit 1))))
select * from charge_export where '@activeRecord.status = 1

dataPolicies.name: income_own_organization_and_child
dataPolicies.label: Чтение зачислений только своей и дочерних организаций

restrictions.sqlQuery: select income.* from income where (payee_inn, payee_kpp) in (select inn, kpp from organization where recid in (select organizationid from users where login in (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid'))) or (select parent_organization from organization where organization.inn = payee_inn and organization.kpp = payee_kpp) = (select organizationid from users where login in (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid'))

dataPolicies.name: income_own_organization
dataPolicies.label: Чтение зачислений только своей организации

restrictions.sqlQuery: select income.* from income where (payee_inn, payee_kpp) in (select inn, kpp from organization where recid in (select organizationid from users where login in (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid')))

restrictions.sqlQuery: select * from income_request where reccreatedby = '@activeUser.recid'

dataPolicies.name: income_request_own_organization_and_child
dataPolicies.label: Чтение экспорта зачислений только своей и дочерних организаций

restrictions.sqlQuery: select income_request.* from income_request join rdev___auth_users as au on au.recid::text = income_request.reccreatedby join users as u on u.login = au.login join organization as o on o.recid = u.organizationid where o.recid in (select organization.recid from organization where organization.recid = (select organizationid from users where login = (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid')) or organization.recid in (select organization.recid from organization where organization.parent_organization in (select organizationid from users where login = (select login from rdev___auth_users where recid = '@activeUser.recid'))))

submenuItems.name: report_org_charge_count
submenuItems.title: Статистика по участникам и количеству начислений

submenuItems.name: report_org_charge_count_full
submenuItems.title: Детализированная статистика по участникам и количеству начислений

enum.value: Все платежи, имеющие статус уточнения или аннулирования
Все активные платежи, для которых отсутствуют начисления

types.name: payer_name
types.formula: select case when payer.payer_type in (2,3) then payer.orgname when payer.payer_type in (1,4) then payer.lastname||' '||payer.name||' '||payer.middlename end from payer where charge.payer = payer.recid

types.name: user_fio
types.formula: select COALESCE(lastname,'')||' '||COALESCE(firstname,'')||' '||COALESCE(patronymic,'') from rdev___auth_users where users.login = rdev___auth_users.login

types.name: user_role
types.formula: select recdescription from rdev___auth_groups where recid in (select groupid from rdev___auth_groupuser where userid in (select recid from rdev___auth_users where rdev___auth_users.login = users.login))

types.name: payer_doc_ser_num
types.formula: select case when payer.payer_type in (2,3,4) then payer.inn when payer.payer_type in (1) then payer.doc_ser_num end from payer where charge.payer = payer.recid

types.name: payt_reason_calc
types.formula: select payt_reason.recname from payt_reason where payt_reason.recid in (select charge_data.payt_reason from charge_data where charge.charge_data = charge_data.recid)

types.name: kbk_calc
types.formula: select charge_data.kbk from charge_data where charge.charge_data = charge_data.recid

types.name: payment_organization_name_by_sender_identifier
types.formula: select organization.name from organization where organization.generate_by_api is distinct from true and organization.sender_identifier = payment.recipientidentifier limit 1

types.name: charge_amounttopay_calc_format
types.displayName: Остаток, руб. (Формат с 2 знаками после запятой)
types.formula: select to_char(amounttopay, 'FM999G999G999G999G999G999G990D00') from charge as tmp_charge where tmp_charge.recid = charge.recid

types.name: charge_totalamount_calc_format
types.displayName: Сумма, руб. (Формат с 2 знаками после запятой)
types.formula: select to_char(totalamount, 'FM999G999G999G999G999G999G990D00') from charge as tmp_charge where tmp_charge.recid = charge.recid

types.name: senderrole_codes_relation
types.formula: select string_agg(reccode, ', ') from sender_role where sender_role.recid in (select organization_roles.sender_role from organization_roles where organizationid=organization.recid)

enum.value: Начисления, не полностью сквитированные с платежами
Предварительные начисления, не полностью сквитированные с платежами
Предварительные начисления и статусы их квитирования
Неоплаченные предварительные начисление, сформированные ГИС ГМП
Предварительные начисления, сформированные ГИС ГМП, не полностью сквитированные с платежами
Предварительные начисления, сформированные ГИС ГМП, и статусы их квитирования

methods.name: charge_view
methods.isEnabled: function() { return activeRecord.acknowledgment_status == 3 || activeRecord.acknowledgment_status == 4 || activeRecord.acknowledgment_status == 5 || activeRecord.acknowledgment_status == 6 || activeRecord.acknowledgment_status == 7 || activeRecord.acknowledgment_status == 8|| activeRecord.acknowledgment_status == 9; }

toolbarButtons.name: sysEdit
toolbarButtons.visible: function() { return countOfSelectedRecords == 1 && (selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 6 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 7 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 9 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 91 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 92 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 93 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 94 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 95); }

toolbarButtons.name: viewChargeBtn
toolbarButtons.visible: return countOfSelectedRecords == 1 && !(selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 6 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 7 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 9 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 91 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 92 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 93 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 94 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 95);

toolbarButtons.name: chargeEditBtn
toolbarButtons.visible: function() { return countOfSelectedRecords == 1 && (selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 1 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 2 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 3 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 4 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 5); }

toolbarButtons.name: chargeAnnulBtn

toolbarButtons.name: chargePrintBtn
toolbarButtons.visible: function() { return countOfSelectedRecords == 1 && (selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 1 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 2 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 3 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 4 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 5 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 10|| selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 11|| selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 12|| selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 13|| selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 14|| selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 15|| selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 16|| selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 6); }

contextButtons.name: viewChargeMenu
contextButtons.visible: return countOfSelectedRecords == 1 && !(selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 6 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 7 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 9 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 91 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 92 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 93 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 94 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 95);

contextButtons.name: onEdit
contextButtons.visible: function() { return countOfSelectedRecords == 1 && (selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 6 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 7 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 9 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 91 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 92 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 93 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 94 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 95); }

contextButtons.name: pressEnter
contextButtons.enabled: return countOfSelectedRecords == 1 && !(selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 6 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 7 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 9 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 91 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 92 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 93 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 94 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 95);

contextButtons.name: chargeEditMenu
contextButtons.visible: return countOfSelectedRecords == 1 && (selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 1 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 2 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 3 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 4 || selectedRecords[0].acknowledgment_status == 5);

contextButtons.name: chargeAnnulMenu

fields.name: account_number
fields.displayName: Номер счета получателя средств (номер казначейского счета)

validationRules.message: Проверьте корректность указанных номеров счета получателя средств и единого казначейского счета. Уточнить попадает ли счет получателя средств в перечень для передачи начислений в ГИС ГМП можно в ТОФК
